wikipedia_page.main: John Ernest Clements  (born 1867 – 1945 Q3) was an English footballer. His regular position was at full back. He was born in East Markham, Nottinghamshire. He played for Newton Heath, Notts County, and Rotherham Town.

response: *John Clements, American director of the Association for Renaissance Martial Arts
*John Clements Wickham (1798–1864), naval officer and judge
